name: @pelevesque/is-palindrome
description: Checks if a string is a palindrome with a grouping feature not seen in other palindrome checkers.

scripts.test: standard && mocha --reporter spec && node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec test/*
